field.label: Firewall ID
field.help: Please sign in to shop.dynfi.com, go to My Account » My Firewalls and click Register new firewall. Then input this ID and click Register.

field.label: Shop account username
field.help: Input your shop.dynfi.com account credentials and click Apply to download the certificate. Remember to register this firewall first.

field.label: Certificate
field.help: You can copy-paste certificate and key manually from shop.dynfi.com. You will find it on My Account » Enterprise page.
